# 1.7.0 (2018-09-23)

# Bug Fixes

  • Field: support overloaded Query.prototype.sql (e123a9d)

# Features

  • support inserts/updates with raw sql (8ec7c5b)

# 1.6.2 (2018-08-23)

# Bug Fixes

  • Model: do not duplicate Model.config.fieldNames (4fe3cbb)

# 1.6.1 (2018-08-22)

# Bug Fixes

  • NoRowsError: add a reference to the query instance (2a627d9)

# 1.6.0 (2018-08-21)

# Features

  • Field: support non-matching regex validators (52a7d72)

# 1.5.0 (2018-08-19)

# Features

  • Query: add hasOption and unsetOption (17ad152)
  • Query: add Query.prototype.clone (2315c45)
  • Query: add unsetOptions and getOption (d896aec)

# 1.4.2 (2018-08-16)

# Bug Fixes

  • Query: fix handling of string options (2125f6e)

# 1.4.1 (2018-08-15)

# Features

  • Query: add support for FOR UPDATE OF
Model.fetch({ forUpdate: true, of: ['table'] });
Model.query.forUpdate().of('table').fetch();

# 1.4.0 (2018-08-15)

# VERSION DELETED

# 1.3.0 (2018-08-13)

# Features

  • support configuring a model's schema name
Model.schema = 'schema';
Model.table = 'table';

# 1.2.1 (2018-08-07)

# Bug Fixes

  • Field: handle undefined in array json schemas (bd0367f)

# 1.2.0 (2018-07-30)

# Features

  • Model: allow setting query and plugin options (83f8dba)
  • Model: set default query options (37dffbe)

# 1.1.0 (2018-07-26)

# Features

  • Query: add the failing sql to query errors (ad8c9da)

# 1.0.1 (2018-07-05)

# Bug Fixes

  • Query: add validation for undefined where values (de888d8)

# 1.0.0 (2018-06-27)

# 1.0.0-next (2018-06-27)

# Bug Fixes

  • Field: JSON.parse and validate json fields (44ec983)
  • Field: throw validation errors for invalid JSON strings (aa82671)
  • Knorm: allow plugins to update base Model class (bd8f182)
  • Knorm: enable plugins to access themselves (b6a1f7b)
  • Knorm: no need for a new Transation per instance (0ba58aa)
  • Knorm: show correct errors for reserved property names (d89981a)
  • Model: allow adding methods for non-unique fields (191e202)
  • Model: allow unsetting primary field in a child model (24e84dc)
  • Model: cast data after instance db operatons (c8784d9)
  • Model: do not rely on Query returning the same instance (ae89fda)
  • Model: remove unncessary function binding for virtuals (3a2f79b)
  • package: update knex peerDep versions (dd5de39)
  • package: update validator to version 10.1.0 (471e8b4), closes #73
  • Query: cast before validate (dc6a851), closes #fb394f3
  • Query: cast values after validating (d222922)
  • Query: change default placeholder to $ (414fda0)
  • Query: do not consider primary field for array updates (b12be78)
  • Query: do not include primary fields if not requested (7c24a16)
  • Query: negate "where in []" queries (88c006f)
  • set knorm and models defaults (6dfa402)
  • Query: fix handling of where expressions with array values (25a4968)
  • Query: getData -> getFieldData (174561a)
  • Query: handle a "no fields option" edge case (35d4d1d)
  • Query: handle unknown directions in orderBy (4b9cbbb)
  • Query: handle update/insert with empty data (355e49b)
  • Query: quote columns for insert and update (1921975)
  • Query: support non-fields in where/having clauses (b249aa8)
  • Query: update single row when primary field is set (9d88237)
  • Where: ensure aliases are not overwritten (5071e7d)
  • WithKnex: throw KnormError instances (13603b0)

# Code Refactoring

  • Field: drop 'json' from jsonObject and jsonArray (cccaab0)
  • Field: Field.types.uuidV4 => Field.types.uuid4 (cdeb2aa)
  • Model: refactor configs into Model.config (6cd3d4e)
  • Model: remove debug-specific checks (4510e94)
  • Model: remove unnecessary static getters (81d433c)
  • Query: add query errors as statics (6623e90)
  • Query: complete rewrite (28f461c)
  • remove base classes from exports (9b7fb87)
  • Query: remove Query.prototype.count (fd4d131)
  • Query: remove relations-related code (3fe4408)
  • Query: swap knex with sql-bricks (53ffe28)
  • Virtual: remove hasGetter and hasSetter (734c734)

# Features

  • Field: support the fieldName: fieldType config shorthand (cba1504)
  • Knorm: add addModel (97b66d1)
  • Knorm: add clone (b894409)
  • Knorm: add accessors to models (7ea0938)
  • Knorm: link scoped classes to the Knorm instance (29ff34d)
  • Knorm: store plugins added by name (e7f2a1d)
  • Model: add getField (5e4d5b0)
  • Model: add getVirtualData (9b23c6f)
  • Model: add getVirtualDataSync and getDataSync (5da6c6f)
  • Model: add Model.removeField (ee10c65)
  • Model: add Model.where (8f3dbcb)
  • Model: add models to the knorm instance (52c9b57)
  • Model: expose getFieldData (a8e0ec1)
  • Query: add Query.where getter (0d6595f)
  • Query: add debug mode with better stack traces (3fdf2e5)
  • Query: support between expressions with an array value (0f5f403)
  • Query: support in queries with an empty array (4982fdc)
  • Query: support objects for where expressions (b1b826d)
  • Transaction: add transaction-scoped classes (173e283)
  • Transaction: add TransactionError (224033a)

# Performance Improvements

  • KnormError: do not format formatted messages (59e2796)
  • Model: inherit model configs when setting configs (7bb98b9)
  • Query: concat insert/update batches async (6139b8f)
  • Query: only cast data returned from the database (2be52e3)

# BREAKING CHANGES

Knorm:

  • no more knex option. not needed since knorm now delegates db connection-handling to plugins
  • const { Model } = require('@knorm/knorm') does not work anymore. base classes can be accessed via a Knorm instance or as Knorm statics
  • plugins are now required to have a name property

Model:

  • refactored:

    • Model.setFields => Model.config.fields / Model.fields setter
    • Model.getFields => Model.config.fields / Model.fields getter
    • Model.setVirtuals => Model.config.virtuals / Model.virtuals setter
    • Model.getVirtuals => Model.config.virtuals / Model.virtuals getter
    • Model.setVirtuals => Model.config.virtuals / Model.virtuals setter
    • Model.getPrimary => Model.config.primary / Model.primary getter
    • Model.getUnique => Model.config.unique / Model.unique setter
    • Model.getReferences => Model.config.references / Model.references getter
    • Model.getNotUpdated => Model.config.notUpdated / Model.notUpdated getter

  • refactored:

    • Model.primary => Model.config.primary
    • Model.notUpdated => Model.config.notUpdated
    • Model.unique => Model.config.unique

  • removed checks:

    • Removed check for unknown keys in setData
    • Removed check for unknown fields for all methods that accept a fields option e.g. validate, getData, getDataSync, getFieldData, getVirtualData, getVirtualDataSync, cast and setDefaults
    • Removed check for virtuals having a setter in setData. Now a JS TypeError is thrown instead

Field:

  • renamed field types:

    • jsonObject => object
    • jsonArray => array
    • uuidV4 => uuid4

Virtual:

  • removed hasGetter and hasSetter instead, use !!virtual.get or !!virtual.set

Query:

  • swap knex with sql-bricks. this change means that knorm only generates SQL and leaves query-running (connections, pooling, transations) to db-specific plugins

  • removed support for Oracle and MSSQL which was not properly tested anyway

  • support for relations moved to @knorm/relations: https://github.com/knorm/relations

  • removed Query.prototype.count, moved to @knorm/paginate: https://github.com/knorm/paginate

  • fixed the lean (or forge: false option) option to not cast values. This option now works as it should, completely bypassing creation of Model instances (which includes casting values)

  • inverted specifying of field aliases for fields and .returning to match knex's query builder: .fields({ field: 'alias' }) to .fields({ alias: 'field' })

  • removed Query.errors and added them directly to Query

  • all where* e.g. whereIn are removed and replaced with expressions e.g. where(where.in(field, values))

  • insert does not resolve with the same instances that were passed. we cannot guarantee that all instances passed in will be returned from the insert

  • update does not resolve with the same instances that were passed

  • fix: joined models are always returned as an array unless first is configured on the joined query

  • removed checks:

    • removed Query.errors. Errors are now exported directly as Query statics e.g. Query.QueryError, Query.FetchError
    • removed support for fields with Field instances: .fetch({ fields: Model.fields }), .fields(Model.fields)
    • removed support for returning with Field instances: .insert({ foo: 'bar' }, { returning: Model.fields }), .returning(Model.fields)
    • removed validation of fields for all Query methods: .fetch({ where: { unknownField: 'foo' } }) will throw
    • removed casting of aliased fields: if a field has a post-fetch cast function it won't be cast of the field is aliased in a fetch
    • removed support for .where({ field: [] }) to mean "where field in array". where is now just a proxy to knex's query builder's where
    • removed support for having with object values i.e. .having({ id: 1 }). having is now just a proxy to knex's query builder's having
    • removed the within alias for transaction
    • removed the check against doing a fetch on a joined query
    • removed support for the on option with Field instances: .on(Model.fields.id)
    • removed support for the field option with Field instances: .field(Model.fields.id)
    • removed support for distinct with field instances: .distinct(Model.fields.id)
    • removed check against insert and update with non-object values
    • removed check against insert and update with instances of a different model

# 0.11.1 (2018-05-02)

# Bug Fixes

  • Field: JSON.parse and validate json fields (fc338d6)
  • Query: cast before validating on insert (0030442)

# 0.11.0 (2017-12-29)

# Code Refactoring

  • Model: remove ByPrimaryField methods (d52389c)

# Features

  • Model: add support for ByField methods (9882d41)

# BREAKING CHANGES

  • Model: instead of fetchByPrimaryField etc, use:
Model.fields = {
  id: {
    primary: true,
    methods: true
  }
};

to have these methods automatically added:

Model.fetchById;
Model.updateById;
Model.deleteById;

# 0.10.1 (2017-12-28)

# Features

  • Knorm: support plugins as functions (851716e)

# 0.10.0 (2017-12-23)

# Bug Fixes

  • Field: do not share cast functions across clones (626e653)
  • KnormError: support error messages (c785150)
  • Model: fix inheritance (f1b8a1c)

# Code Refactoring

  • Field: remove updateModel() in favour of clone() (2320384)
  • Model: remove ById methods (ddd8376)
  • Model: remove fieldNames (40c8edd)
  • Model: simplify config inheritance (3a98135)

# Features

  • Knorm: add Knorm helper class (fab70eb)
  • Model: add getQuery (cd4141a)
  • Model: add support for "not-updated" fields (97a1eb4)
  • Model: add support for primary fields (a3a8d0d)
  • Model: add support for unique fields (a1bec79)
  • add support for plugins (cf19074)

# BREAKING CHANGES

  • Model: removed Field.prototype.clone and Virtual.prototype.clone
  • Model: previously, the primary field was assumed to be one of the fields that should not be updated by Query.prototype.update, now it has to be specified:
Model.fields = {
  id: { type: 'integer', primary: true, updated: false }
};
  • Model: ```js Model.fetchById => Model.fetchByPrimaryField Model.updateById => Model.updateByPrimaryField Model.deleteById => Model.deleteByPrimaryField
* **Model:** instead of using the `fieldNames` config to define
the primary field, use the `primary` Field config:

```js
Model.fields = {
  id: { type: 'integer', primary: true }
};

# 0.9.3 (2017-11-23)

# Bug Fixes

  • Field: allow equals validation with a zero value (7ec3a7a)
  • Field: allow maxLength validation with value zero (45846e0)
  • Query: add joins before all other options (cd1ccdd)

# Features

  • Query: add whereRaw (fc7efc9)

# 0.9.2 (2017-11-16)

# Bug Fixes

  • fix regex validation error messages (fdab926)

# 0.9.1 (2017-11-01)

# Bug Fixes

  • Transaction: fix Promise interface (6c44faf)

# 0.9.0 (2017-11-01)

# Bug Fixes

  • Field: call custom validators if the value is null (4c977a2)
  • Field: do not share any and date validators (28a6c09)
  • Field: fix JSON validation (890fca2)
  • Field: make validateTypeWith private (469ce0e)
  • Field: match error messages with config options (4766cb1)
  • Field: stop sharing validators (3df91e4)
  • Model: cast should not be async (9ace467)
  • Query: always return arrays from query methods (33b882c)
  • Query: return an array from Query.prototype.insert (34f243e)
  • QueryError: fix errorneous truncating of some knex errors (779b1a9)

# Features

  • Model: validate field and virtual names (bcbde2c)

# 0.8.1 (2017-10-06)

# Features

  • Query: support returning the first updated/deleted model (8f94c73)

# 0.8.0 (2017-10-05)

# Code Refactoring

  • Query: do not special-case instances with an id (e82173d)

# Features

  • Model: ensure id is set for db operations on instances (5c8163a)

# BREAKING CHANGES

  • Query: to conform with other Query methods, update now always resolves with an array. If passed an instance with an id, it no longer adds the "where id" clause, this has instead moved to Model.prototype.update (similar to Model.prototype.fetch and Model.prototype.delete)

# 0.7.3 (2017-10-04)

# Bug Fixes

  • Model: always pass the id for instance db operations (2b2fede)
  • package: update validator to version 9.0.0 (57354f7)

# 0.7.2 (2017-09-05)

# Bug Fixes

  • Field: add validator methods per type (aa52e26)
  • Field: avoid schema validation for json strings (7a68ae8)
  • Field: do not validate json(b) types (86b9479)
  • Query: do not throw require errors for innerJoins (9a58d4d)

# Features

  • Field: add 'number' type (776498e)
  • Field: add support for 'regex' validators (893aca8)
  • Query: add 'lean' option (237a627)

# 0.7.1 (2017-08-30)

# Bug Fixes

  • Field: allow null values for json schema validators (64fc7f0)

# 0.7.0 (2017-08-30)

# Bug Fixes

  • Field: fix error message path for json-array fields (6a382a4)
  • Field: fix error messages for schema fields (ca99958)
  • Query: cast models after validation (a51d33f)

# Code Refactoring

  • Field: name cast functions explicitly (2e192e1)
  • Field: setModel => updateModel (b4f0833)

# Features

  • support json schema validation (46dfd72)
  • Field: add support for 'any' field types (af4cde4)
  • Field: add support for date types (6b2adf7)
  • Field: add support for email types (cec2115)
  • Field: support 'equals' validator (7c184e8)
  • Field: support jsonb field types (456cc35)
  • Model: add Model.count (598ee98)
  • Query: add support for SELECT DISTINCT (1b1d358)
  • Query: support options for count() (c251415)

# BREAKING CHANGES

  • Query: before, Query was casting models before validation, which meant that the value passed to custom validators would already be cast. this change might require custom validators to be updated.
  • Field: refactored:
  • Field.prototype.setModel to Field.prototype.updateModel
  • Virtual.prototype.setModel to Virtual.prototype.updateModel

removed Field.prototype.setReference

  • Field: field cast options changed from:
Model.fields = {
  foo: {
    cast: {
      save() {},
      fetch() {}
    }
  }
};

to:

Model.fields = {
  foo: {
    cast: {
      forSave() {},
      forFetch() {}
    }
  }
};

# 0.6.2 (2017-08-18)

# Features

  • Query: support batch inserts (03ad68a)
  • Query: support passing options to CRUD methods (9821f0c)

# 0.6.1 (2017-08-16)

# Features

  • Field: add throwValidationError (c234b33)
  • Model: expose getField and getFields (7bdc10e)

# 0.6.0 (2017-08-11)

  • feat(field) support customizing validation errors (4d6dcca)

# Bug Fixes

  • Query: fix formatting of query error messages (9bb85de)

# Code Refactoring

  • standardize options (dd73690)

# BREAKING CHANGES

  • Query: QueryError arguments have changed and KnormError does not auto-format messages anymore due to:
    • removed Field.errors in place of only Field.ValidationError
    • changed ValidationError arguments
  • Field.prototype.cast/Model.prototype.cast options are changed:
    • options.save => options.forSave
    • options.fetch => options.forFetch

# 0.5.0 (2017-08-08)

# Features

  • Field: allow overriding the cast method (c3f86a5)

# BREAKING CHANGES

  • Field: Field.prototype.hasCast refactored to Field.prototype._hasCast

# 0.4.2 (2017-08-08)

# Features

  • support inserting arrays of data (da75f1e)

# 0.4.1 (2017-08-04)

# Bug Fixes

  • Model: only use the id for where clauses (a26e42e)

# Features

  • Query: support updating multiple rows (17f2ac5)

# 0.4.0 (2017-08-03)

# Bug Fixes

  • column: copy column name when cloning field instances (bfa01ec)

# Code Refactoring

  • Model.idField => Model.fieldNames.id (45ade15)
  • remove timestamps functionality (a8192ee)

# Features

  • Model: add Model.fieldNames (9e22776)

# BREAKING CHANGES

  • timestamps are now moved to knorm-timestamps plugin
  • Model.idField => Model.fieldNames.id

# 0.3.0 (2017-07-28)

# Code Refactoring

  • Query: join/with -> leftJoin/innerJoin/join (0a679c2)

# BREAKING CHANGES

  • Query: removed Query.prototype.with and changed Query.prototype.join to do an inner join query

# 0.2.4 (2017-07-28)

# Bug Fixes

  • Query: fix field aliases (b0badb8)

# 0.2.3 (2017-07-27)

# Bug Fixes

  • Model: fix cloning of virtuals (209923f)

# 0.2.2 (2017-07-27)

# Bug Fixes

  • Query: use the table name in joined queries (3636d41)

# Features

  • Query: support 'raw' and 'column' where/having options (b60ec1b)

# 0.2.1 (2017-07-26)

# Bug Fixes

  • Field: copy cast functions when cloning (8b997ed)
  • Field: fix validation of JSON strings (b41e3ef)
  • Query: disallow 'options' as an option (3bdafcb)

# Features

  • Query: add support for require with count() (8ed78cf)
  • add casting of field values (562dfd4)

# 0.2.0 (2017-07-21)

# Bug Fixes

  • remove code duplicated by mistake (69cef5b)

# Features

  • add KnormError (f92722c)
  • export custom error classes (026c6a5)

# 0.1.0 (2017-06-05)

# Bug Fixes

  • Field: do not snake-case column names by default (ae1d067)
  • Query: handle null responses from the database (84b5566)
  • Query: set default values for flags (c1fe03a)

# Features

  • Model: add db methods (c34f9f7)
  • Model: add delete methods (74918a4)
  • Query: add Query.prototype.delete (8caed15)
  • Query: add Query.prototype.save (b80a695)
  • Query: alias Query.prototype.transaction as 'within' (496771f)
  • Query: alias Query.prototype.with as 'join' (5afc820)
  • Query: update by id if the id is set (011d222)

# 0.0.2 (2017-03-20)
